message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the money loses value quickly for you, so I propose a 60/40 split to start.
Your offer was generous, Alice, but let's find a middle ground. How about a 52/48 split in my favor considering the inflation?
The inflation is hitting you harder, Bob. I'll meet you in the middle, 57/43.
Time is running out, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest option at this point.
Bob, I understand the pressure of the inflation, but 50/50 isn't fair given how it impacts you. I'm proposing 54/46 to meet closer to the middle ground.
